vscode:prepublish: Description for 'vscode:prepublish' script: npm run package
compile: Description for 'compile' script: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
package: Description for 'package' script: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
pretest: Description for 'pretest' script: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
